docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 12--The Food and Drug Administration is getting a new face and a new figure--the better to protect the public health and pocketbook.

headline.main: New Man in F.D.A. Cracks Down on Drugs

docs.abstract: article on Goddard's crackdown on dangerous drugs
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 12--The Food and Drug Administration is getting a new face and a new figure--the better to protect the public health and pocketbook.

byline.original: By JANE E. BRODY Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 9 Commissioner James L. Goddard of the Food and Drug Administration acknowledged today that his agency had failed properly to enforce existing drug laws with regard to testing of the proclaimed 'miracle drug" DMSO.

headline.main: DRUG AGENCY HEAD CONCEDES LAXITY; Tells House Unit Testing of 2 Preparations Was Faulty

docs.abstract: Comr Goddard and aide Dr Sadusk admit FDA failed properly to enforce laws in tests on humans of 'miracle drug' dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), HR subcom hearing; tests were halted in Nov after FDA got belated rept of damage to eyes of experimental animals
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 9  Commissioner James L. Goddard of the Food and Drug Administration acknowledged today that his agency had failed properly to enforce existing drug laws with regard to testing of the proclaimed 'miracle drug" DMSO.

byline.original: By JANE E. BRODY Special to The New York Times
